We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private WilderSwingIndex _si;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_si = SI(symbol, limitMove);

// In OnData()
if (_si.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SI Current", _si.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.si = self.SI(symbol, limitMove)

# In OnData()
if self.si.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SI Current", self.si.Current);
